name: places/ChIJB64QTuxYwokRTJkpIIfSzVw
formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S #2d, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S #2d, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of meeting Dr. Eleonora Markesic for the first time during my annual appointment, and I am thoroughly impressed. Dr. Markesic's clear and thorough explanations immediately put me at ease, ensuring I understood every aspect of my health concerns.

Her attentiveness and genuine interest in my well-being were remarkable. Despite it being our initial meeting, Dr. Markesic listened actively to all my concerns and addressed each one with care. The appointment felt more like a collaborative conversation than a routine checkup.

What stood out the most was Dr. Markesic's ability to provide valuable feedback and personalized recommendations. She took the time to tailor her advice to my specific health needs, showcasing her commitment to individualized care. Her expertise and thoughtful approach instilled confidence in the level of care she provides.

In summary, Dr. Eleonora Markesic left a lasting impression on me during our first encounter. Her clear communication, attentive nature, and personalized recommendations make her an outstanding OB-GYN. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking a caring and knowledgeable healthcare professional.

originalText.text: Today was my first visit with Dr. Eleonora Markesic and all I can say is wow! I have had an extremely difficult time finding a halfway decent GYN in NYC, and four years later think I finally found the one! Unlike any other doctors I've seen in the last ~10 Years, Dr. Markesic was thorough, thoughtful, and insightful. Was seen nearly immediately, and in and out in ~40 minutes but didn't feel rushed. Really happy with my experience and excited to cont. seeing her. Recommending to all my friends in the city!

originalText.text: This review is not for the doctor but for the reception. I called with a highly regarded referral for this doctor for a specific procedure that it says she treats on her website, but the front desk woman could not of been more rude. She said she doesn’t do any procedures and only refers patients to other doctors. That doesn’t make any sense and it specifically says she treats the condition on her website. I let her know that her website states she does the procedure and treats the condition and that I received a good referral for the doctor for this exact procedure. She said no and that I should cancel my consult on my end and had such an attitude. I sure hope the doctor is aware of how her front office treats prospective patients who are looking to get referral treatment for procedures she has listed on her website and from other doctors who have a high regard for her. The way the reception spoke was appalling and I hope the doctor is aware of this.

originalText.text: Wonderful doctor! She will treat with a holistic approach and look at your health in whole. The wait time is never too long, will make you feel that she is giving you the 100% attention.

text.text: Wonderful doctor! She will treat with a holistic approach and look at your health in whole. The wait time is never too long, will make you feel that she is giving you the 100% attention.

originalText.text: The original appointment went great and the doctor was fantastic. Called to discuss billing and was sent to voice-mail box that was full each time but I did receive a call back later that day from someone in billing who was super helpful and explained how the billing system works.
